thread.title: Lamar Odom found unconscious in brothel
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom found unconscious in brothel

title: Lamar Odom found unconscious in brothel
text: Former Laker Lamar Odom in critical condition after being found unconscious in Nevada brothel Olgun Uluc FOX SPORTS Former Laker Lamar Odom in critical condition after being found unconscious in Nevada brothel Olgun Uluc FOX SPORTS Lamar Odom’s condition is unknown but reports suggest that the former Laker is in bad shape. FORMER Los Angeles Laker Lamar Odom has been found unconscious in a Nevada brothel, according to a report by TMZ. Odom was reportedly partying at the Love Ranch South in Pahrump, Nevada over the past few days when a woman found him unconscious in his VIP suite, immediately calling for the manager of the establishment. The manager reportedly saw a “mucus-type liquid coming our of his nose and mouth”, potentially due to an herbal substitute for viagra that Odom was taking. An ambulance took Odom to Pahrump hospital where he was intubated, before being airlifted to Las Vegas for further treatment. It’s still unclear what condition Odom is in. Further reports indicate that the Los Angeles Lakers front office has received word of Odom’s condition, and are attempting to track down their former player. Other Stories
